document_data.name: Sespech
document_data.mainbody:
'''Sespech''' was a country located in the southwest region of the [[Vilhon Reach]].

The nation was ruled by Baron [[Aldorn Thuragar|Aldorn "Foesmasher" Thuragar]], who furthered their independence after once being ruled by [[Chondath]].
document_data.Geography:
* [[Golden Plains]]: These plains between the [[Nagaflow]] and [[Arran River]] were so named for their tall, golden grasses.
* [[Nagawater]]: A deep lake that contained many [[water naga]]s.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|902}}, in the aftermath of the [[Rotting War]], Sespech gained its independence from [[Chondath]].
